#Text=[0212] After this solution (11-c) was left to stand for at least 24 hours, the solution was directly used as a solution (11-c') for providing a catalyst for electroless copper plating.

#Text=[0213] After an ABS resin sample subjected to pretreatments, i.e., etching and conditioning, in accordance with a conventional method was immersed in the solution (11-c') for 5 minutes, the sample was rinsed with water and then immersed in the following solution (11-d) containing a reducing agent for 3 minutes.
#Text=After rinsed with water, the sample was immersed in the electroless copper plating solution (1-e).
